name: Al.Me.Te.Ga
description:
Submission for Aliens Love Videogames, made in a couple of days.

"Al.Me.Te.Ga - Alien Memory Testing Game"

While we are here, why not also test their short term memory performance.

This small game is inspired by the jams restriction: "create a game that can be played by aliens".

(Bug Feature: you can click and drag) 

(Note: Development was stopped due to Terr@ria update release...)
